It is impossible to even fathom the motivation behind that insane response, so I must assume it is a software glitch or a practical joke.

When I first downloaded and used the app several months ago it owrked fine. Now I cant log in or order anything. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled to no avail. It appears that other users are having the same problem. For now I have stopped using the app or trying to order pizza. Your loss.

title: OfficeSuite - Office, PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint
description:
OfficeSuite is the smart choice for office productivity. Combining all the features that you need to read, edit, and create Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDFs, OfficeSuite is the richest and most feature-packed solution for personal or professional use on mobile devices.

Documents, Spreadsheets & Presentations 
•	Powerful applications packed with helpful tools to handle any task.
•	All the advanced features you need – format painter, track changes, conditional formatting, formulas, presentation mode and much more.
•	Familiar desktop-inspired feel that you know and love.
•	Export Word, Excel, or PowerPoint documents to PDF.
•	Advanced security options.

Advanced PDF management  
•	Open, view & annotate PDFs.
•	Work with fillable forms.
•	Digitally sign PDF documents.
•	Enhanced security and permissions management.
•	Convert PDF documents to Word, Excel or ePub.

Designed for work on the go 
•	Integrated cloud storage for easy access to files – get 5GB free on our MobiDrive cloud or link your existing Google Drive, OneDrive, Box or Dropbox accounts.
•	Cross-platform capabilities linking your Windows PC with all your Android and iOS mobile devices. 
•	Compatibility with popular file formats – Microsoft, OpenOffice, Apple's iWork and hundreds more.
•	Practical and user-friendly interface optimized for the latest Android version.

OfficeSuite is absolutely free to install and can be used to read, create and save documents. Start our free 7-day trial and you can see all that OfficeSuite has to offer, including editing documents and every other advanced tool and feature. If you like what you get, our flexible monthly and annual pricing plans allow you to select the right solution to best fit your needs.

Premium benefits include: 
•	50GB storage on MobiDrive
•	Unlimited PDF conversions
•	Unlock 20+ advanced features
•	Use with Premium on 2 mobile devices & 1 Windows PC.
•	No ads
•	Priority support

comments: Would give more stars but there is no support for this app, the help file is nothing more of a description of the words on screen no details on how to use anything. No online support or forums I can find website unhelpful and is just a marketing page. Cannot recommend an app that clearly has no customer focused support.

Great Office 365 alternative I have ever found. With other mobile wordprocessors that claim compatability, Word will only view and ask to save to edit. With OfficeSuite's Document app, this never happened, Word only went to editing. This was true for my personal desktop version too, went strait to editing with out any idication of issues. I am a Samsung DeX user and this also gives the best desktop experience. Just wish Aqua Mail was not seperate!

I love the OfficeSuites! I was a hardcore user of Microsoft's Office for over 20 years. I started using OfficeSuites two years ago and I haven't looked back! I have used all the suites including Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, Word, and Mail. They all run smoothly and without issue every time. I would like to see the Mail suite get more options like the option to mark the email "important" or "urgent" for sending and the ability to change the fonts inside the columns and rows, but these are not deal breakers for me. I am so glad I found OfficeSuites!

i just bought a new Samsung tablet, installed this believing it wouldn't have bugs associated with old ones, bought a year's subscription and it is full of glitches. It will not create new documents. It gives me a blank screen, no way to type a number or letter, i can type letters but they do not show or store. So i have to create documents from my Word program and import them in. It boots me out of my document often while i access a web page so not multi-tasking.

Just a rip off. You can't open any existing documents unless you pay for a subscription. So you pay it then you find that it doesn't come with the usual, everyday fonts, such as Arial, Times New Roman etc. These are part of the "Extended Font Pack" apparently 😮. If you want to use any documents that have these fonts (and you probably will, these are the standard, boring, day to day fonts) you'll have to pay another £13.99 for the font pack to get your documents to open properly. Pfffft, keep it

title: Basketball Mania
description:
Attention basketball fanatics! Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in #1 Basketball game - Basketball Mania, a fun way to play Basketball!

Basketball Mania is a fast paced arcade basketball machine game with a built in ticket dispenser, where players are challenged to hit the target scores to move onto the next level and try to beat the highest score. The better the player is, the longer they are able to play!

You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. With each level cleared, the game play will change, with the level of difficulty increasing with each stage.

How to Play:
- Touch a ball and fling it towards the basket to shoot the ball

Game Features:
- Five unique skins: choose your favorite themed environment
- Great game sound effects & music
- Redemption ticket stars payout feature
- Side to side basket movement for challenging play

comments: My only complaint with this game is there is no more levels or skins to choose from. I have done everyone and I just want a bunch of new skins and themes like a Christmas one or different environmental ones just add new ones please then I will write it 5 stars
Very addictive!! brilliant graphics, there's nothing wrong with it, Big 👆 up to whoever created it, I love that shouts when you score the ball, so thanks a lot.

This game is 50\50 My complaint is when u r playing an add pops up and blocks the a nasty game then the timer continiues counting then u get no tickets , and i know adults made these but what currency is tickets can't u guys use coins like every other game. Fix this glitches please
Awesome! Gives you a good concept of muscle memory, in my opinion. Great for super boring days too.

I have been playing this app on and off for about eight years now. But lately, they put a commercial on while your time is running. So about five to seven seconds is run off the clock before you can even start, they really need to fix this problem. It's extremely annoying!!

title: My Home Design - Modern City
description:
Welcome to Modern City! Your new favorite home design game set against a stunning NYC background.

Take this chance to work side by side with star interior designer Chloe Williams and her business partner Liam Gold. From successful career women to newlywed couples to families, clients are on their way to meet Chloe and Liam right now!

Help them design trendy kitchens, cozy living rooms, relaxing bedrooms and more to live the life of their dreams! Solve fun match-3 puzzles to collect coins and use them to select furniture, decor items and more! These lucky clients have very different personalities, needs and ideas but they have one thing in common: They all have high expectations for you to design an amazing home! Can you help them create spaces to relax, enjoy and spend quality time? Because after all a house without character is just a house. Help your clients to turn these houses into sweet designer homes.

It's not going to be easy. You'll have to work and play your way up from the bottom, makeover different rooms and places to become a real designer and put a smile on your clients' faces. Do you have what it takes to remodel, decorate and furbish dream homes and become a household name in the home design game world?

Here's how to do it:

🛠️ Meet interior designer Chloe and Liam. Couples, singles and families, all kinds of clients are waiting for you!

🛠️ Design, renovate, remodel kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms and more in Modern City! Choose furniture and decor according to your style and preferences. Simply tap to decorate and create trendy places in the city.

🛠️ Exciting and addictive Match-3 puzzle games! Play puzzles to collect coins and use them to create your perfect home design!

🛠️ Enjoy witty and fun conversations among interior designers and clients!

🛠️ Express yourself and nurture your interior design skills! Plus, find inspiration for your own home makeover!

🛠️ Play for free and offline!

🛠️ New episodes and match-3 puzzle levels coming out soon!

Are you into the city life? Guam, Hawaii and the Caribbean won't do the trick for you? Come to NYC and play Modern City! Find inspiration, collect high-quality furniture, and decorate with enchanting colors and patterns. Build and design homes and make dreams come true in this match-3 puzzle and home design game! Create a home you'll never want to leave! 🏡



*Please note that [ Modern City ] saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.*

------------------------------------------------

✨DEVELOPER INFO✨

Are you into home design? Puzzle games? CookApps Playgrounds fan?

Join us on Facebook for fun stuff and news about your favorite games!

https://www.facebook.com/PlaygroundsTeam/

comments: Was a great game until the developers doubled the ad content. Not only that, but now the game is freezing after I make my final move to win the level, especially if I use a rainbow ball. If I use a rainbow ball in conjunction with another booster, regardless of what part of the level I'm at, the game freaks out and closes. When it does this, I have to redo the level again. If this continues, I will uninstall and reflect this in an update.

I like this game because it is very relaxing. I also love the choices it gives you to work with. I personally love modern i think it is a cozy and cute inviorment to live in. I also love the matching game it gives you a way to get money. It is like a win win because you get to design and you get to match and overall i think this game is very good and that is why i gave it a five and if i had one complant it would be for a little bit more choices for the fashion sence. I will have my friends play

Stupid & FULL OF ADS. Initially it was pretty good with not many ads. Now it's gotten so bad that there's not just 1 30+ second ad after every game, but 2 or even 3! It is beyond ridiculous how many ads you're forced to sit through in this game. On another note, it annoys me how the characters have been portrayed. The man looks strong and composed, hands folded across his chest. The woman, meanwhile, always has her mouth open, head bobbing, eyes squinting, looking like a silly child-like bimbo.

I like this game because its direct. I mean other renovating games they ask us to earn stars to complete tasks. And those tasks include stupid ones like call a person, look under the bed, etc. But this only involves renovating and nothing else. No wasting time in listening to the people talking. I hate matching games but I'm putting up with it just because o this game is direct. I simply want a renovating game which doesn't have matching games, which doesn't have any stupid tasks and less talk

I like this game because its quick. The graphics are good (not tiny little triangles squares and circles) Also you don't have to play loads of games to get furniture. The prices are pretty reasonable.so you get through rooms quicker

title: Fanatical Basketball
description:
Dribble, shoot, score! Hit the court with Fanatical Basketball, the world’s #1 stunningly immersive basketball game!

Grab the ball, shoot from the downtown or perform spectacular dunks, and rise to the challenge with Fanatical Basketball! Build and manage your team, go head to head in 5-on-5 action and dominate your opponents in nba style matches. Win or go home with lethal shot in playoff seasons. KABOOM!

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics, crazy fluid animations and smart touch controls
- Jam with 30+ teams of customizable 3D players
- Quick Game mode and League Matches mode

comments: I love the game. It has nice graphics and gameplay. Hope for the new updates to come. One thing I noticed selection of the minutes of the game. You can't select how many minutes u want every game has only 2 min. Pls. Fix this issue in the next update.

Interesting game, graphics and sound good but, inability to move to the next stage though I was qualified, by winning in the previous stage and also investing the needed amount, is a put off... So please I hope you would work on it ASAP. Then I will give 5 stars

Well the game is petty good but when i get a wide open 90% it misses and i cant stand that and when you go for a dunk it automatically just like looks like you're doing a layup but like why does it have to be in slow motion and when I go to unlock character I mean a new ball it just new ball action or or closed it just says new ball a lot and then he doesn't even show nothing like the game and then I'll give you a 5-star rating because this game should be like NBA 2K 20

This is great, but I don't like the graphics of this game ,I'm dizzy by it's movements and the worst of all even I'm gonna dunk,shoot in 3 it won't shoot please fix it. So for now I'm giving it a 3. Until you fix it.
The game is good and enjoyable but when ever I want to pass I will send it to my men but it will go to the other team please fix it but it is a good game i am sure that people will like it

title: Background Eraser: Magic Eraser & White Background
description:
Background eraser is the best, 100% free app to erase the backgrounds of your photos. With the marvellous magic background eraser, just choose the area that you wish to remove, and instantly delete it. You can either choose a magnificent background to add or leave it with a white background. We offer lots of different background options for you, including the famous transparent and white background.

Background Eraser is here to make your life easier, now you do not need to learn photoshop to remove the unwanted areas of your photo, because the white background maker does all the job. You will make professinal artists very jealous of your photos. The cropping tool enables you to crop your stunning photo before erasing the surroundings! So, the size of your photo will be perfect to share on the social media. Do not hesitate to share your stunning photo on Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, Tik Tok, Whatsapp, Twitter, Pinterest, VK, Flickr and Tumblr.

We know you want a professional photo editing, then the magic eraser is just for you! Sometimes it might be hard to remove the surroundings when the photos have details, but the png maker solves this problem ✅. Png maker cleans background very professionally, don’t worry about the details of your photo, every corner of your image is going to be recognized by the magic eraser. Erase the surroundings perfectly with the png maker then add a white background or transparent background. Besides, you can choose any image you like as a background. Even you are staying at home you can pretend like you are on holiday, impress and surprise your friends with amazing views. 

This fascinating png maker comes up with many wonderful features... such as adjusting color, adjusting saturation, blurring the imperfection, and much more. Explore them all and show your talent using this amazing photo editor. 

Smooth the edges after using the magic eraser to get the most professional photo. You can arrange the smoothness level easily from 1 to 5! This is the most amazing feature of the white background maker. After removing the surroundings, add funny stickers, beautiful filters or effects to personalize your photo. Background eraser helps you to create flawless photos with the surroundings you wish. Edit your amazing photos with the white background maker to make them flawless. 

We are sure Gacha Life players will also admire this app ❤. Use awesome png maker to erase the surroundings of the Gacha Life characters! With the white background, your Gacha Life characters will grab all the attention. Blurring the unwanted parts of your Gacha Character using the png maker is so much fun. Join the new trend!

Background eraser is developed by Lyrebird studio, it is the best app to delete the unwanted areas of photos or to remove any other objects that you do not want to see. Magic eraser makes the process even easier. You can create a perfect photo with the scene you wish just in seconds. Download it now to add a magical touch in your photos with the background eraser. Do not forget to share your flawless photo on Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, TikTok, Whatsapp, Twitter, Pinterest, VK, Flickr and Tumblr.

comments: This is the best eraser app I have ever installed! Its smooth, easy to use ,and it helps me a lot with making edits for my videos! Ok at first but then I couldn't even choose a picture to erase the backround from. Im trying to renstall it. It didn't work. About a month later I reinstall it and after another 15 uses the same thing happened. I have to keep reinstalling it because when I choose the file it closes every one in a while . But it gets another star from last time I used it.

Background Eraser is a great app! if you use the auto setting while erasing you can very easily erase the backround of a photo. but there is a downside, for some reason the adds that pop up are too big and I can't click off them, and the only way is to get off the add, is to close the app and restart. Is there anyway to fix this?

Its really good! I love how its really easy and has the right tools for me,( im sorry if i dont spell right its my broken keybored) but theres one problem, when im done removing the background for a video, it just kicks me out. And also the ads, there are to many, ( sorry if im annoying) but i love ghe app so far! Keep up to work! :3

Its good but there is to many ads,i would give it a 4 but theres way to many ads please fix the ads problem,but if it doesnt i might have to give it a 2 or a 1 if this gets better i will give it a 5 or either a 4 star that is all,but other than that its nice ..just please fix it

title: Dude Theft Wars: Open World Sandbox Simulator BETA
description:
Welcome to Dude-o-polis!
A beautiful city where all the awesome and perfect dudes live!


Jack used to live a normal dude life when one day he found out that life can be so much more fun in Dude-o-polis. You can drive around the town in any car you want and drift your way while you freeroam around the towns, parks and fields and a 3D City full of bliss, buy any weapon you like with cash and become a Gangstar, tease, annoy or SLAP other dudes,
 Troll People with grenades and watch them "RUN",  explore beautiful buildings or just spend your day slacking on your smartphone!

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN:
Dude Theft Wars is an open world sandbox game and a life simulator as well as a perfect Dude Simulator. The main objective is to enjoy the beautiful city and things it offers on a pleasant sunny day. You can do what you like to do. Explore the City in a shopping cart or shoot at garbage on a sunny day, say hello to your neighbor, enter any building and steal their cash or join a mafia gang and go on a heist stealing around cash &  money and spend it to buy weapons or sports cars with cash or go crazy and shoot some dude with crazy weapons and start a battle royale to form a gangster squad mafia and become the best mafia gangstar ! (ง︡'-'︠)ง

Just everything that can be done in a dude’s perfect life. Are you a Dude?

Troll People with grenades and watch them "RUN", explore beautiful buildings or just spend your day slacking on your smartphone!

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN:


Dude Theft Wars is an open world sandbox game and a life simulator as well as a perfect Dude Simulator. The main objective is to enjoy the beautiful city and things it offers on a pleasant sunny day. You can do what you like to do. Explore the City in a shopping cart or shoot at garbage on a sunny day, say hello to your neighbor, enter any building and steal their cash or join a mafia gang and go on a heist stealing around cash & money and spend it to buy weapons or sports cars with cash or go crazy and shoot some dude with crazy weapons and start a battle royale to form a gangster squad mafia and become the best mafia gangstar ! (ง︡'-'︠)ง

Just everything that can be done in a dude’s perfect life. You can live a regular life of an ordinary dude or you can do crazy stuff, annoy other dudes, fight other dudes, explode grenades, drive an auto and watch silly ragdolls fly all around, have a dance party with the perfect dudes and so on – it is all up to your imagination!

FEATURES:


☑ An open world sandbox game
☑ Experience all the action in First Person
☑ Visit Weapon Shop to buy INSANE Weapons like AK47, SMG, REVOLVER, SHOTGUNS Or just use your hand to SLAP People.
☑ Drive many different Cars like RAMP CAR, MONSTER TRUCK, Rc CARS. Alien UfO, SKATEBOARD, DragSter, QuadCars, Karts Or just drive around the town in a SHOPPING CART.
☑ Fun AI and hundreds kinds of people with ragdoll effects.
☑ Perform amazing stunts with ragdolls and Cars that are as fun to watch complete as they are to see fail horribly.
☑ Use your smartphone to use dUber and order Brand New Cars.
☑ Explore Beautiful City and buildings and find Secrets and easter eggs.
☑ Do action pack stunts in slow motion
☑ Troll People with grenades and watch them "RUN"

Can you simulate?
If yes! then Download

title: Dead Empire: Zombie War
description:
Dead Empire: Zombie War is a real-time war strategy game set in the late modern period. The story is about a group of unique and fascinating women with different life experiences, who help the Allies fight against the invaders and the evil zombie forces created by the invaders in the war. You will play as a Commander in the game. Train powerful troops and recruit beautiful female Officers to lead. Unite other Commanders to eliminate the Invaders and evil zombie forces and finally achieve world peace by establishing a stronger Guild!

1. Brand New Troop Control System
The game uses a new free control system that allows players to command multiple troops to march, garrison, and change targets and marching routes on the battlefield. Strong troops cannot prevail without excellent leadership and strategies!

2. Vivid War Scenes
We have created vivid cities and battlefields based on actual geography from late modern Europe, including landmarks that people will recognize. Plus, we have also simulated the famous war machines used during the late modern period, which aim to bring you back to the era when legends emerged.

3. Real-time Multiplayer Combat
Fighting against real players is always more complicated and appealing than battling the A.I. You still need help from other players, even when you're strong because you won't be fighting against one opponent. It could be an entire Guild, or even more.

4. Multiple Countries to Select
You can choose different countries to play in the game. Each country has its own Country Trait, and the combat units unique to each country are all famous war machines that served the countries throughout history. You can lead the army that you want in the game, and launch attacks on your enemies!
Millions of players have joined this legendary battlefield. Expand your Guild, show your power, and conquer this land!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zombiewar.tap4fun

comments: Pretty lame considering you can not delete your account. Simply Uninstall and supposedly solves the problem. Why is this feature not at the beginning at base of the game? I should be able to delete my stuff. It is my stuff to delete if I want to. Played both versions and it is not so friendly to f2p. I mean I thought it to be a real RTS but not nearly close.

Too many potty mouth kids INSULTING each other and PLAYERS without any reaction from developers on report. Stopped playing, uninstalled. It's basically like any other PAY game. The more MONEY you spend, the more you can HARASS others. Not the most elaborate strategic war games I've seen but its ok. Gets a little boring with all the waiting around. Horny sounding and looking animated girls narrate the game progress. Whatever floats one's boat...

It's a good game. But still needs some adjustments. Like, it unecessarily cuts my 1500 game golds in the name of HQ transportation, when I tried to transport it to a nearest place of my guild member. After deducting the above amount, it simply says it cannot be done due to some kind of boundries. I mean, which type of game is this when I am unable to help my team members, couldn't arrange a rally or be a part of it? Seriously, a lot more work is required to improve this game.
Great, attack heads could be improved, it's hard to pull the troop from the crowd and then you get annoyed.

This is Kiss of War with Zombies. That's it. As far as I can tell, there are very minor differences, such as you can't choose the United Kingdom, Helena isn't available in the beginning, and Pandora is now Chimera (though a lot of the spoken dialogue still references Pandora). Really lazy re-skin, but that music makes all of the difference. Stick with KoW is you've put any significant time in it, otherwise play this for the awesome music. Oh, and zombies!
